question: Dr Hemu Adhikari, who passed away recently, was the noted personality from which field?
explanation: Dr Hemu Adhikari (81), the veteran film and theatre actor, has passed away in Mumbai, Maharashtra on May 22, 2018. He acted in Sai Paranjpe\'s \"Katha\" and Marathi films like \"Dhyaas Parya\" and \"Harishchandrachi Factory\". He was known for his cameo in Rajkumar Hirani\'s \"Lage Raho Munna Bhai\" (2006).
